content:
Under the Enhanced Medical Benefits for COVID-19, the Repatriation of Mortal Remains due to COVID-19 is not available for the Basic plan, but is Unlimited for the Silver, Gold, and Platinium plans.
Under the Enhanced Medical Benefits for COVID-19, the Emergency Medical Evacuation due to COVID-19 is not available for the Basic plan, but is Unlimited for the Silver, Gold, and Platinium plans.
questions: What benefits are not available under the Basic plan for COVID-19?
Are the Repatriation of Mortal Remains benefits unlimited in the Silver plan for COVID-19?
Is Emergency Medical Evacuation covered under the Gold plan for COVID-19?
Does the Platinium plan offer unlimited Repatriation of Mortal Remains for COVID-19?
What is the coverage for Emergency Medical Evacuation in the Silver plan for COVID-19?
Are there any limitations on COVID-19 benefits in the Basic plan?
Which plans offer unlimited Emergency Medical Evacuation for COVID-19?
Is the Repatriation of Mortal Remains benefit included in the Basic plan for COVID-19?
What are the differences in COVID-19 coverage between the Basic and Platinium plans?
Which plans provide unlimited benefits for both Repatriation of Mortal Remains and Emergency Medical Evacuation due to COVID-19?
